product_name: Mountain House Garden Green Peas - 2 Servings
long_description: Instant, fresh-tasting green peas that make a great side dish for camp meals. Stand-up pouch creates an easy way to cook and eat your meal; made from high-barrier foil, the pouch keeps your meal hot. Just mix contents with boiling water in the pouch provided, let stand for a few minutes, and then serve. Get your fiber on the trail. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Instant, fresh-tasting green peas that make a great side dish for camp meals.
